summary: The diff implements all three requirements (REQ-4, REQ-5, REQ-6) with a 3-page flow, a moving 'No' button, and creative page transitions. The implementation maintains the romantic theme and includes all specified acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: Hover attempt counter triggering page transition after exactly 5 attempts
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies 'multiple No hover attempts or creative interaction' to trigger Page 2, but does not specify an exact threshold of 5 attempts. The implementation hardcodes this specific number without requirement guidance.

hallucinated_features.description: Detailed bulleted list of date benefits on persuasion page
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-6 requires 'creative persuasive message or playful content' but does not specify listing benefits like 'Great conversation guaranteed', 'Delicious food', 'Unforgettable memories', and 'Zero pressure, just fun'. While creative and appropriate, these specific selling points were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Specific success page messaging about reaching out with details
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-6 specifies 'shows a success message when user clicks Yes' but does not define the content. The implementation adds 'I'll reach out to you soon with all the details. Get ready for an unforgettable time together!' which goes beyond the basic success confirmation requested.
